document_data.mainbody: '''Bhún Ludwakazar''' ({{Pronounce|BOON|_|lud|WAK|ah|zah|refs={{Cite adventurers league/Mayhem in the Earthspur Mines|36}}}}) was a [[dwarf]] gladiator of the [[Ludwakazar]] clan in [[Mulmaster]].
document_data.Personality: Having been exiled, Bhún felt he had lost his honor and only wanted a death would win him glory in the [[afterlife]]. He regretted the conflict with his brother and secretly hoped they would reconcile before death.
document_data.Activities: Bhún was the champion gladiator of the illegal arena run by [[Gethmedra Darmov]] under the [[Black Blade and Bloody Boar]] tavern.
document_data.History:
Bhún once lived with the rest of his clan in the [[Earthspur Mountains]], acting as custodian of the mystical [[Chamber of Falling Stones]]. The recent mining excavations alarmed them. Bhún had a conflict with his brother, King [[Iorn Ludwakazar]], and was subsequently exiled.

After that, he went to Mulmaster where he gained fame as the '''Stone Dwarf''' in gladiator matches.

In [[1491 DR]], an adventuring party approached him in order to learn about the mines and he told them his history, asking them to also send a letter of reconciliation to his brother.
